description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国政治人物，汉族，辽宁凌源人。曾任江苏省省长、中共江苏省委书记、江苏省人大常委会主任、第十三届全国政协农业和农村委员会主任。中共第十七届中央候补委员、第十八届中央委员。
description.en: A politician of the People's Republic of China, of Han ethnicity, from Lingyuan, Liaoning. He served as the Governor of Jiangsu Province, Secretary of the Jiangsu Provincial Committee of the CCP, Chairman of the Standing Committee of the Jiangsu Provincial People's Congress, and Director of the Committee for Agriculture and Rural Affairs of the 13th National Committee of the CPPCC. He was an alternate member of the 17th Central Committee and a full member of the 18th Central Committee of the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国解放军少将，罗志军之父。曾任解放军总后勤部装备部副部长。
description.en: A major general of the People's Liberation Army of the People's Republic of China, father of Luo Zhijun. He served as the deputy director of the Equipment Department of the PLA General Logistics Department.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的执政党。
description.en: The founding and sole ruling party of the People's Republic of China.

en: China University of Political Science and Law

description.zh-cn: 位于中国北京市的一所著名高等学府，以法学和政治学为特色。
description.en: A prestigious university in Beijing, China, specializing in law and political science.

description.zh-cn: 中国人民解放军海军三大舰队之一，隶属于北部战区。
description.en: One of the three major fleets of the People's Liberation Army Navy, subordinate to the Northern Theater Command.

nodes.id: 中国共产主义青年团中央委员会

en: Central Committee of the Communist Youth League of China

description.en: The national leading body of the Communist Youth League of China.

zh-cn: 中国青年实业发展总公司

description.zh-cn: 曾隶属于共青团中央的国有企业。
description.en: A state-owned enterprise formerly affiliated with the Central Committee of the Communist Youth League.

description.zh-cn: 中国江苏省南京市的地方国家行政机关。
description.en: The local state administrative organ of Nanjing City, Jiangsu Province, China.

en: Nanjing Municipal Committee of the Chinese Communist Party

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在南京市的领导机关。
description.en: The leading body of the Chinese Communist Party in Nanjing City.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党在江苏省的领导机关。
description.en: The leading body of the Chinese Communist Party in Jiangsu Province.

description.zh-cn: 中国江苏省的地方国家行政机关。
description.en: The local state administrative organ of Jiangsu Province, China.

en: Standing Committee of the Jiangsu Provincial People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 江苏省人民代表大会的常设机关。
description.en: The standing body of the Jiangsu Provincial People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中华人民共和国国务院总理。曾接替罗志军担任中共江苏省委书记职务。
description.en: A Chinese politician, currently the Premier of the State Council of the People's Republic of China. He succeeded Luo Zhijun as the Secretary of the Jiangsu Provincial Committee of the CCP.

全国人大环境与资源保护委员会
en: Environment Protection and Resources Conservation Committee of the National People's Congress

description.zh-cn: 全国人民代表大会的专门委员会之一。
description.en: One of the specialized committees of the National People's Congress.

全国政协农业和农村委员会
en: Committee for Agriculture and Rural Affairs of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference

description.zh-cn: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会的专门委员会之一。
description.en: One of the specialized committees of the National Committee of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国的首都。
description.en: The capital of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共江苏省委书记、江苏省省长。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as Secretary of the Jiangsu Provincial Committee of the CCP and Governor of Jiangsu Province.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中华人民共和国副主席、中共南京市委书记。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as the Vice President of the People's Republic of China and the Secretary of the Nanjing Municipal Committee of the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任南京市市长。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as the Mayor of Nanjing.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任南京市市长。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as the Mayor of Nanjing.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任江苏省省长。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as the Governor of Jiangsu Province.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中共南京市委书记。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as the Secretary of the Nanjing Municipal Committee of the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任中国共产党中央委员会总书记、中华人民共和国主席。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as the General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party and the President of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，现任中国共产党中央委员会总书记、中华人民共和国主席。
description.en: A Chinese politician, currently serving as the General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party and the President of the People's Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，曾任江苏省省长。
description.en: A Chinese politician who served as the Governor of Jiangsu Province.

description.zh-cn: 中国政治人物，接替罗志军担任全国政协农业和农村委员会主任。
description.en: A Chinese politician who succeeded Luo Zhijun as the Director of the Committee for Agriculture and Rural Affairs of the National Committee of the CPPCC.

nodes.id: 中国共产党中央委员会

zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会
en: Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党的中央领导机构。
description.en: The central leading body of the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的国家通讯社。
description.en: The state news agency of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 香港的一份中文报纸。
description.en: A Chinese-language newspaper in Hong Kong.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党中央委员会的机关报。
description.en: The official newspaper of the Central Committee of the Chinese Communist Party.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国时期由奉系军阀张作霖、张学良父子统领的军队。
description.en: The army led by the Fengtian clique warlords Zhang Zuolin and his son Zhang Xueliang during the Republic of China era.

description.zh-cn: 1936年12月12日，张学良和杨虎城为了劝谏蒋介石改变“攘外必先安内”的既定国策，停止内战，一致抗日，在西安发动“兵谏”。
description.en: On December 12, 1936, Zhang Xueliang and Yang Hucheng launched a 'remonstrance by military force' in Xi'an to persuade Chiang Kai-shek to change his established national policy of 'internal pacification before external resistance,' stop the civil war, and unite to resist Japan.

description.zh-cn: 中国抗日战争期间，由中国共产党领导的常规军队，主力由中国工农红军改编。
description.en: A regular army led by the Chinese Communist Party during the Second Sino-Japanese War, with its main force adapted from the Chinese Workers' and Peasants' Red Army.

nodes.id: 中国人民解放军总后勤部

zh-cn: 中国人民解放军总后勤部
en: General Logistics Department of the People's Liberation Army

description.zh-cn: 曾是中央军事委员会主管军队后勤专业勤务和后勤保障工作的领导机关。
description.en: It was the leading body under the Central Military Commission responsible for the military's logistics professional services and support work.

description.zh-cn: 罗文是罗志军的父亲。
description.en: Luo Wen is Luo Zhijun's father.

description.zh-cn: 罗志军于1969年4月加入中国共产党。
description.en: Luo Zhijun joined the Chinese Communist Party in April 1969.

description.zh-cn: 1995年在中国政法大学获得在职研究生学历和法学硕士学位。
description.en: In 1995, he obtained an in-service postgraduate degree and a Master of Laws degree from China University of Political Science and Law.

description.zh-cn: 1968年至1978年在北海舰队服役。
description.en: Served in the North Sea Fleet from 1968 to 1978.

relationships.target: 中国共产主义青年团中央委员会

position.zh-cn: 常委兼实业发展部部长
position.en: Standing Committee Member and Director of the Industry Development Department

description.zh-cn: 1993年起担任共青团中央常委兼实业发展部部长。
description.en: Starting from 1993, he served as a Standing Committee Member of the Central Committee of the Communist Youth League and Director of the Industry Development Department.

relationships.target: 中国青年实业发展总公司

description.zh-cn: 1994年兼任中国青年实业发展总公司董事长。
description.en: In 1994, he concurrently served as the Chairman of the China Youth Industry Development Corporation.

description.zh-cn: 先后担任南京市副市长、代市长、市长。
description.en: Successively served as Deputy Mayor, Acting Mayor, and Mayor of Nanjing.

relationships.target: 中国共产党南京市委员会

position.en: Standing Committee Member, Deputy Secretary, Secretary

description.zh-cn: 先后担任中共南京市委常委、副书记、书记。
description.en: Successively served as Standing Committee Member, Deputy Secretary, and Secretary of the Nanjing Municipal Committee of the CCP.

relationships.target: 中国共产党江苏省委员会

position.en: Standing Committee Member, Deputy Secretary, Secretary

description.zh-cn: 先后担任中共江苏省委常委、副书记、书记。
description.en: Successively served as Standing Committee Member, Deputy Secretary, and Secretary of the Jiangsu Provincial Committee of the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 担任江苏省人民政府省长。
description.en: Served as the Governor of the Jiangsu Provincial People's Government.

relationships.target: 江苏省人民代表大会常务委员会

description.zh-cn: 担任江苏省人大常委会主任。
description.en: Served as the Chairman of the Standing Committee of the Jiangsu Provincial People's Congress.

relationships.target: 全国人民代表大会环境与资源保护委员会

description.zh-cn: 担任全国人大环境与资源保护委员会副主任委员。
description.en: Served as the Vice Chairman of the Environment Protection and Resources Conservation Committee of the National People's Congress.

relationships.target: 中国人民政治协商会议全国委员会农业和农村委员会

description.zh-cn: 担任第十三届全国政协农业和农村委员会主任。
description.en: Served as the Director of the Committee for Agriculture and Rural Affairs of the 13th National Committee of the CPPCC.

relationships.target: 中国共产党中央委员会

position.zh-cn: 第十七届中央候补委员、第十八届中央委员
position.en: Alternate Member of the 17th Central Committee, Member of the 18th Central Committee

description.zh-cn: 罗志军接替梁保华担任中共江苏省委书记、江苏省省长、江苏省人大常委会主任等职务。
description.en: Luo Zhijun succeeded Liang Baohua as Secretary of the Jiangsu Provincial Committee of the CCP, Governor of Jiangsu, and Chairman of the Standing Committee of the Jiangsu Provincial People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 李强接替罗志军担任中共江苏省委书记及江苏省人大常委会主任职务。
description.en: Li Qiang succeeded Luo Zhijun as Secretary of the Jiangsu Provincial Committee of the CCP and Chairman of the Standing Committee of the Jiangsu Provincial People's Congress.

description.zh-cn: 罗志军接替李源潮担任中共南京市委书记职务。
description.en: Luo Zhijun succeeded Li Yuanchao as Secretary of the Nanjing Municipal Committee of the CCP.

description.zh-cn: 李学勇接替罗志军担任江苏省省长职务。
description.en: Li Xueyong succeeded Luo Zhijun as Governor of Jiangsu Province.

position.en: Secretary of the Jiangsu Provincial Committee of the CCP

description.zh-cn: 罗志军担任中共江苏省委书记期间，中共中央总书记为胡锦涛。
description.en: When Luo Zhijun served as Secretary of the Jiangsu Provincial Committee of the CCP, the General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee was Hu Jintao.

position.en: Secretary of the Jiangsu Provincial Committee of the CCP

description.zh-cn: 罗志军担任中共江苏省委书记期间，中共中央总书记为习近平。
description.en: When Luo Zhijun served as Secretary of the Jiangsu Provincial Committee of the CCP, the General Secretary of the CCP Central Committee was Xi Jinping.

position.zh-cn: 江苏省委副书记兼省长
position.en: Deputy Secretary of Jiangsu Provincial Committee and Governor

description.zh-cn: 罗志军任中共江苏省委书记期间，李学勇任省委副书记兼省长。
description.en: While Luo Zhijun was Secretary of the Jiangsu Provincial Committee of the CCP, Li Xueyong served as Deputy Secretary of the Provincial Committee and Governor.

position.zh-cn: 江苏省委副书记兼省长
position.en: Deputy Secretary of Jiangsu Provincial Committee and Governor

description.zh-cn: 罗志军任中共江苏省委书记期间，石泰峰任省委副书记兼省长。
description.en: While Luo Zhijun was Secretary of the Jiangsu Provincial Committee of the CCP, Shi Taifeng served as Deputy Secretary of the Provincial Committee and Governor.

description.zh-cn: 《人民日报》在罗志军遗体送别仪式后报道，称其为“中国共产党的优秀党员”。
description.en: After the farewell ceremony for Luo Zhijun's remains, People's Daily reported and called him 'an outstanding member of the Communist Party of China'.

description.zh-cn: 中央通讯社声称罗志军是自杀身亡。
description.en: The Central News Agency claimed that Luo Zhijun died by suicide.

description.zh-cn: 星岛日报声称罗志军是自杀身亡。
description.en: Sing Tao Daily claimed that Luo Zhijun died by suicide.

description.zh-cn: 罗文于1935年参加东北军。
description.en: Luo Wen joined the Northeastern Army in 1935.

description.zh-cn: 西安事变后，罗文投向延安，参加了八路军和中国共产党。
description.en: After the Xi'an Incident, Luo Wen went to Yan'an and joined the Eighth Route Army and the Chinese Communist Party.

relationships.target: 中国人民解放军总后勤部

position.en: Deputy Director of the Equipment Department

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国成立后官至解放军总后勤部装备部副部长。
description.en: After the founding of the People's Republic of China, he rose to the position of Deputy Director of the Equipment Department of the PLA General Logistics Department.
